1:
I love Yahweh because he hears\q my voice and my pleas for mercy.
\q
2:
Because he listened to me,\q I will call on him as long as I live.


\q
4:
Then I called on the name of Yahweh:\q "Please Yahweh, rescue my life."


\q
5:
Yahweh is merciful and fair;\q our God is compassionate.
\q
6:
Yahweh protects the naive;\q I was brought low, and he saved me.


\q
7:
My soul can return to its resting place,\q for Yahweh has been good to me.
\q
8:
For you rescued my life from death,\q my eyes from tears,
\q and my feet from stumbling.


\q
9:
I will serve Yahweh\q in the land of the living.
\q
10:
I believed in him, even when I said,\q "I am greatly afflicted."
\q
11:
In my confusion I said,\q "All men are liars."


\q
12:
How can I repay Yahweh\q for all his kindnesses to me?
\q
13:
I will raise the cup of salvation,\q and call on the name of Yahweh.
\q
14:
I will fulfill my vows to Yahweh\q in the presence of all his people.
\q
15:
Precious in the sight of Yahweh\q is the death of his saints.


\q
17:
I will offer to you the sacrifice of thanksgiving\q and will call on the name of Yahweh.


\q
18:
I will fulfill my vows to Yahweh\q in the presence of all his people,
\q
19:
in the courts of Yahweh's house,\q in your midst, Jerusalem.
\q Praise Yahweh.
